copy.instruction0: Move pieces left and right with your mouse. Click the mouse button to flip your pieces.
copy.instruction1: Left and Right keyboard keys also move your pieces. Press up to flip your pieces and down to move pieces down.
copy.instruction2: Try and match pieces in groups of three or more of a kind.
copy.instruction3: Eliminate blocks in groups or chains for extra points!
